GSD.product_version: versions from v4.16 to before v5.12.9
GSD.description:
net: dsa: mt7530: fix VLAN traffic leaks

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.12.9 by commit 82ae35b6c14feae5f216913d5b433e143c756d4e, it was introduced in version v4.16 by commit 83163f7dca5684816d01c8ccf4857aa74801e7b7. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: dsa: mt7530: fix VLAN traffic leaks
